name: Connect Animal 2016
description:
Connect Animal is a classic game that you maybe play in the internet store or when you was the child.
The classical puzzle PC game.
2 modes to play:
- Classic mode.
- Gravity mode.
Very simple gameplay, you just connect 2 same animals within 3 lines.
There are many levels, many animals.
Great graphic, Cool sound.

Have fun and let's play, let's kill the time now.
